content: This app is a joke. It's a skin of a poor website, not a true app, so has all the clunkiness of web stuff on a small device. Sign-in is always your NHS ID, so if you have a strong random password you have to have it written down, as it won't work with password vaults. No option for phone-based MFA. Phone back button returns to you the beginning of the app, not back a page. No way of returning to the previous page of info, so you have to go "home" and start again each time. Try to book an appointment at my GP - "None available", but their own website has plenty of slots. Almost no medical records listed and can't find my COVID details, so using it for the passport is a waste of time. Really hope the NHS haven't spent much money on this, a junior programmer just out of school could do better. If I could give negative stars I would. It's rubbish.

However, each person will need their own email address to register. You cannot use the same email address as another person because the email address is the unique identifier for each account and cannot be shared.

content: If you are planning to travel using the vaccination status part of the app you will also find that you need a printed copy. When you do this via receipt of an email which gives you a link to the NHS to then print it off. But the printout does not print your full name, only your first name. It also says on the print "check against the bearer's identity". So you will fail the ID check as the names will not match. (See news reports about airlines refusing boarding due to mismatched documents).

content: Does not work. We were told in Wales 2 days ago we could now access our covid passport. This is not true. I have registered and passed the I.d. verification. And had the email saying I can now access my covid passport but everytime I use the app I log in then it says it needs to connect with g.p. but it can't as I am in Wales.
replyContent:
Unfortunately, people in Wales cannot currently use the NHS App to access their NHS COVID Pass and vaccination status. Please find more information here:
https://gov.wales/get-nhs-covid-pass-show-your-vaccination-status-travel
You can access your NHS COVID Pass for international travel online and download or print the Pass as a PDF document.
